questiontext.text: Which random variable X is not a discrete variable?  I A soccer team plays 12 games in a given season. Suppose X is the number of games that this team won.™ II A woman buys a lottery ticket every week in which the probability of winning of 1 euro is 1/10. Suppose X is her winnings after one year.Ê III A student waits for a bus to pass by every ten minutes. Suppose X is the number of minutes he waits at the bus stop.

answer.text: I is not a discrete variable.

feedback.text: I is not a discrete variable Incorrect

answer.text: II is not a discrete variable.

feedback.text: II is not a discrete variable…: Incorrect

answer.text: III is not a discrete variable.

feedback.text: III is not a discrete variable…: Correct

answer.text: All of them are not discrete variables.

feedback.text: All of them are not discrete variables…: Incorrect
